full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MA MCHOD PHYAG CHEN DANG SBRAGS PA'I KHRID KYI ZIN BRIS ZRID ZHI'I GDUNG SEL BDUD RTZI'I CHU RGYUN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
